definitions.definition: The act of making a list of items ; an itemizing .
examples: His itemization of the inventory did seem accurate, however it omitted several crucial entries.

definitions.definition: The system of items available to players and their design and qualities.
examples: The itemization in this game is terrible. All the good items are so rare, it gives players no desire to grind at all.

main_definition: The act of making a list of items ; an itemizing .
secondary_definitions: ( video games ) The system of items available to players and their design and qualities.
